3.verse: Grace, mercy and peace from God the Father and from Jesus Christ, ( G ) the Fatherâ€™s Son, will be with us in truth and love.

4.verse: It has given me great joy to find some of your children walking in the truth, ( H ) just as the Father commanded us.

5.verse: And now, dear lady, I am not writing you a new command but one we have had from the beginning. ( I ) I ask that we love one another.

6.verse: And this is love: ( J ) that we walk in obedience to his commands. ( K ) As you have heard from the beginning, ( L ) his command is that you walk in love.

7.verse: I say this because many deceivers, who do not acknowledge Jesus Christ ( M ) as coming in the flesh, ( N ) have gone out into the world. ( O ) Any such person is the deceiver and the antichrist. ( P )

8.verse: Watch out that you do not lose what we  have worked for, but that you may be rewarded fully. ( Q )

9.verse: Anyone who runs ahead and does not continue in the teaching of Christ ( R ) does not have God; whoever continues in the teaching has both the Father and the Son. ( S )

10.verse: If anyone comes to you and does not bring this teaching, do not take them into your house or welcome them. ( T )

11.verse: Anyone who welcomes them shares ( U ) in their wicked work.

12.verse: I have much to write to you, but I do not want to use paper and ink. Instead, I hope to visit you and talk with you face to face, ( V ) so that our joy may be complete. ( W )

13.verse: The children of your sister, who is chosen by God, ( X ) send their greetings.
